scripts.build: bun run --filter @olymroad/api build && bun run --filter @olymroad/web build
scripts.infra:up: docker compose up -d --wait postgres minio && docker compose run --rm minio-init && docker compose run --rm migrate
scripts.infra:logs: docker compose logs -f postgres minio migrate minio-init
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose up -d --wait postgres && docker compose run --rm migrate
